name: Sir Dice
description:
Sir Dice is a short top-down adventure about a brave die who quests to defeat the evil Black Knights. Roll to attack!

Use arrow keys and space to control the game.

Built as a submission for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Game designed and made by Triona McCarthy, audio from ZapSplat, OpenGameArt, and Soundimage.org.
